entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low plus 3 except 10 along the coast. Risk of frost.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 3 except 10 along the coast. Risk of frost. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of drizzle. High 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers or drizzle. Temperature rising to 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to 17 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016
